body.name: KUNMI Womens Curvy High Waist Stretch Butt Lifting Skinny Colombian Jeans
features: Super stretchy and soft material, very comfortable to wear.
High rise women skinny jean made with slight stretch denim, can wear with boots, sweater chain, coat, also suit for any tops.
Care Wash: Machine wash separately in cool water,do not bleach,tumble dry low.

Keep your look sleek and sophisticated flattering and curve figure; The perfect style, quality and fit; Please note that apparel size vary by brand; Because we use high elastic fabric. So please refer to the size chart. Due to the different displays of the computers, the color of the real item may be a little different from the picture shown.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #4,172 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #59 in Women's Jeans

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THE SEXIEST WOMEN’S JEANS: Are you looking for a pair of women’s denim pants that will enhance and show off your bootylicious curves? KUNMI has specially designed these Colombian style skinny jeans for those women who have a Brazilian bum, as well as for those women who wish to make their butt look rounder and more worked out.

FULL LENGTH SKINNY JEANS: Our stretch jeans have a skinny leg cut, so they are fitted and they will hug every curve of your legs and waist perfectly. Thanks to their tight yet comfortable design, these juniors / Plus size clothing jeans for women can be worn with any kind of shoes – high heels, sneakers, platform, flat shoes, high and ankle boots. And since they are full-length, KUNMI high / low waist jeans will not make your legs look shorter. On the contrary your legs will look leaner.

A UNIQUE FABRIC BLEND: Here at KUNMI we have used premium quality fabrics in order to create a breathable, stretchable and comfortable blend. More specifically, our soft Colombian style jeans are made with the finest materials. Once you wear them, you won’t want to take them off! Apart from comfortable, this fabric is also durable, so it can be washed and it will never lose its softness, elasticity, and push up design. The comfort of jeans is enhanced and the Butt-Liftion is improved.

WEAR THEM FROM MORNING TO NIGHT: These super skinny jeans for women can be worn at any hour of the day, and they can be matched with any top you want! Do you want to be casual? Just wear a T-shirt or a sweatshirt on top. Do you want to go out? Wear a nice top and add some accessories? Do you have a professional meeting? Wear a shirt or a blazer on top. In other words, with these stylish women’s denim pants you can create multiple outfits and combinations! Flattering shapewear for your booties.

Q&A Q1:True to size? A1: Our jeans are standard size, order your size: US S(2-4);M(6-8);L(10-12);XL/1XL(14-16);2XL(16-18). Q2:What material of this womens Shirts? A2: Made of 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester, very soft and skin-friendly material, cozy and comfortable. Q3: Will it shrink or fade? A3: We had do some test,and promise it won’t shrink or fade after washing. Q4:Does it has a bad smell or itch you? A4: No bad smell to be found,and we made of soft and high quality material,it won't itch you,don’t worry. Q5:Is it the same color as in the picture? A5: We try our best to make color is the same with our jeans, but please know that color may be lighter or darker due to the different PC display. Q6:What's the return policy if I don't like it? A6: If your order is shipped by Amazon, you can free return it. If it is shipped from seller,you can return it within 30 days. Q7:How to clean it? A7: Recommended Hand Wash, hang to dry in shade, prohibit bleaching,use laundary bags if you use washing machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like these jeans. I only did 4 stars for comfort because of my specific body type. They fit great everywhere but uncomfortable to me because they come up so high (but that is why I bought them originally)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fit me perfectly but by the same size in blue and there all loose around the legs and the hips. So go a size smaller if your buying the in light blue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Highly advise to NOT buy these jeans . I am normally a size 7-9 so I ordered an XL based on the size chart. The fit with plenty of room but there are so many issues. For starters, the pockets upfront pop out and make it looks like the pants don’t fit. Even if you attempt to hide them, it does no good, they just do it again. The second day I wore them the third button popped off because the hole for it was cut too large . Like not even when I’m sitting down , I would just be standing there and clink , there it goes again rolling on the ground . They are not what I’d call high wasted at all , barely to the naval . Plus they are not at all the color shown in the picture, which is really the least frustrating thing, but worth knowing . Just overall bad quality and definitely not for $36. Hope this helps so you don’t make the same mistake I did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First off: these jeans are very cute and soft and stylish, but they run big!I’m 5’6, 195 and the 2X just slides down my waist. These are also NOT high waist. They sit right below my belly button.If I had not worn them for 2 days right away I’d have returned. But, with a belt they are fine.I’d wash them in cold delicate cause of the buttons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty decent jeans
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a large and they fit pretty good. They stretch and I’d say they are flattering to the figure. My only issue is there are a lot of buttons and it can be a little inconvenient to undo and redo them. Another issue I have is, as someone with rather short legs, I feel these were made with someone with longer legs in mind so they kinda bunch a little at the ankle. Other than that, very comfortable and easy to walk in.On another note, not sure if it’s an issue of the supplier or Amazon, the pants were delivered in a clear plastic package so if you want to get these as a surprise gift for someone who lives with you, get to it first I guess?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these jeans. They fit well, are comfortable, are well made, and look amazing. I usually wear a size 10 and bought the Large and would say it was right on for size. I wish they were just a bit higher waisted, but not an issue. Husband says it shows off my butt and looks great on me.I would defiantly recommend these to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Fit not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to like these!! I ordered a medium and they were too loose for what I wanted so I returned them and then ordered a small hoping they would fit more snug the way a tight fitting jean should. I didn't get much lift from the butt, the waist still felt too large and frumpy and the length from the bottom of the buttons to the top was too long and bunched in the crotch area. I have a short waist at 5'2" so maybe for a longer waisted torso, these jeans would fit as expected. I had to return these jeans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best jeans I have ever owned!
reviews.reviewText: The fit is amazing, the stretch is amazing too. They don’t sag, they keep their shape… but the best part is the pockets!!! They’re actually pockets!!! I haven’t had real pockets in women’s jeans… EVER!!!! They’re the only jeans I will ever buy! ❤️
I ordered a medium as recommended by Amazon. I am 5’,5” and weigh 150 pounds. These jeans are easily two sizes too big for me. I have requested to return them.
